name: Rottenwood Lake
storyline: You have been waiting for this long weekend for ages. Finally some peace and quiet to enjoy your favorite outdoors activity: fishing! And you found this new place that looks almost too pleasant. You've been waiting to drop your fishing line into Rottenwood Lake for a long time. But the Lake has been also been waiting for you.
summary: This game was crafted with love in a weekend for the Haunted PS1 game jam.
